    1: import pandas._testing as tm
    2: 
    3: 
    4: def test_head_tail(string_series):
    5:     tm.assert_series_equal(string_series.head(), string_series[:5])
    6:     tm.assert_series_equal(string_series.head(0), string_series[0:0])
    7:     tm.assert_series_equal(string_series.tail(), string_series[-5:])
    8:     tm.assert_series_equal(string_series.tail(0), string_series[0:0])
